fn.p: The authors declare no competing financial interests.

Author contributions M.D.O., J.P.W., R.E.H. and T.C.J. conceived the study; J.P.W., R.E.H., T.C.J., S.K. and E.D.R collected sediment cores and/or provided samples; M.D.O. processed samples, performed EA-IRMS analysis and analysed the data; S.K. performed diagenetic modelling; M.D.O. and J.P.W. wrote the paper. All authors discussed the results and commented on the manuscript.
